This page covers biological details of component Inferior Prefrontal Gyrus.
Region is part of aHuman target integrated biological model.

  * *Top-down path to region*: Neocortex -> Anterior Lobe (NC.LOBE.ANT) -> Prefrontal Cortex (NC.PFC) -> Ventrolateral Prefrontal Cortex (NC.VLPFC) -> Inferior Prefrontal Gyrus (FCA.NC.IPG) (see [OverallMindMaps Mind Maps])
  * *Brain area*: [BrainAreaFCA Frontal Cortex Area]
  * *Brodmann ID*: 47
  * *Function*: Processing of syntax in oral and sign languages
  * *Notes to function*: Personality, endurance
